act_info.full_title: Magna Carta Day Act (In Memory of Julia Munro, MPP), 2020, S.O. 2020, c. 27
act_info.act_name_text: Magna Carta Day Act (In Memory of Julia Munro, MPP), 2020

content.content:
1 June 15 in each year is proclaimed as Magna Carta Day. 2 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français

1 June 15 in each year is proclaimed as Magna Carta Day.

2 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
